no_patients: No active patients yet. Share your clinician link or code to connect.
select_patient: Select patient to see dia functional trend summary.
coming_soon: Encrypted messaging dey come soon. All communication go route through cMixx for metadata protection.
trend_improving: Functional index don improve for the last 14 days.
trend_declining: Functional index don drop for the last 14 days.
trend_stable: Functional index don remain relatively stable.
trend_unknown: Data no enough to determine clear trend.
clinician_dashboard_desc: Monitor patient wellness with functional trend summaries and risk alerts.
clinician_access_required_desc: You need clinician or practitioner role to access this dashboard.
